item.description:
Join us for the Third Annual running of the JK 5K, 3K Walk and Kid's Fun Run! Families will enjoy a post race celebration with refreshments, kid's activities and music.

The picturesque 5K (3.1 mile) certified course starts and ends at Standish Park on Garden Street. The course runs through the quaint village of Old Wethersfield, passing historic homes, churches and businesses. Parking at Cove Park, short walk to Standish Park.

Additional Information
This event celebrates the life of Jamie Lynne Knotts who died in January 2010 of a rare type of liver tumor at the age of 5 ½ months. She is our angel. This race not only honors Jamie, but also the doctors, nurses, and staff at Connecticut Children’s Medical Center who are living angels to the children and families who are currently struggling with cancer and blood disorders.

Current Reg fee is $25
item.name: Jamie's Run
